about_the_game:
[This game is under development and has not yet been publicly announced. Until a public announcement and trailer has been made, assume this store page to contain only temporary images and information. At this point there are no other official channels for news on this game. Stay tuned.]

Grow The Hell Up is an experimental adventure VR game. Plagued with absurd, dirty, and dark humor, Grow The Hell Up draws inspiration from casual adventure puzzle games, point and click games, and escape rooms. Solve unique physics puzzles, decipher codes, and complete tasks that span across multiple levels.


You're an adult now!

After meeting your soul mate at the bar while celebrating your 21st birthday, you attempt to reconnect with her for a second date. But, it doesn't take long for your new adult freedom to get you into trouble, and reconnecting with her proves to be more difficult than you could've imagined.

- Discover clues that get you closer to finding your soul mate.
- Talk to strangers and do some favors.
- Complete quests and solve puzzles that cross over 8 different levels.
- Relax and play some mini games.

Features:
- Locomotion.
- Hand and head collision with the environment.
- Physics-based interactions.
- Destructible objects.
- Totally normal NPCs saying and doing totally normal things.

content_descriptors.notes: This game may contain content not appropriate for all ages: Explicit language, sexual and adult themes, violence and gore, drug and alcohol abuse.

name: Grow The Hell Up

dejus.descriptors:
Conteúdo sexual
Linguagem imprópria
Drogas ilícitas

short_description: Grow The Hell Up is an absurd experimental adventure VR game. Solve unique physics puzzles, decipher codes, collect hidden items, and do totally normal, totally non-weird things like an adult should do.
